issue.title: [Rust] Inline small JSON and CSV test files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10764](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10764). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some of our tests use small CSV and JSON files, which we could inline in the code, instead of adding more files to test data.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10764?focusedCommentId=17332165) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/137
